title: About Dicilo
subtitle: We connect high-quality businesses with discerning consumers.

consumers.title: For Consumers
consumers.description: Discover recommended businesses and enjoy exclusive benefits.

entrepreneurs.title: For Entrepreneurs
entrepreneurs.description: Showcase your business to attract new customers and grow your business.

club.title: Welcome to the DICILO Community: Connect, Save, and Grow
club.description: Dicilo is not just a store; it is an innovative digital platform and ecosystem that acts as a bridge between businesses and consumers. Our mission is to connect people, knowledge, and businesses globally, based on trust and transparency.

power.title:
1. The Power of Our Community
(Your Global and Local Network)
power.description:
By joining Dicilo, you become part of an 'exclusive' and connected community.

Real Connection: We are a network uniting users and entrepreneurs, enabling effective interactions between key players.

Trusted Environment: We eliminate uncertainty in the buying process thanks to real recommendations from genuine users.

Global and Local Reach: We offer access to unique offers from both local and international products.

save.title:
2. For Those Who Want to SAVE
(Smart Consumer)
save.description:
Dicilo is the ideal place to discover fascinating products at unbeatable prices.

Exclusive Discounts: As a member, you access special discounts with our trusted partners.

Personalized Alerts: Receive tailored recommendations via email or WhatsApp so you don't miss products matching your interests.

Beta Access: Be the first to try new products and access innovations before they hit the market.

Prizes and Giveaways: Your participation entitles you to enter exclusive annual giveaways with fantastic prizes.

earn.title:
3. For Those Who Want to EARN
(Entrepreneurs, Recommenders, and Freelancers)
earn.description:
Dicilo offers concrete tools to monetize your activity, whether you are a business or an active user.

A. As a Recommender:

Earn by Recommending: We transform recommendations into a valuable tool. You can earn rewards ('Referral Bonuses') simply by recommending Dicilo to friends and family.

Real Influence: Your ratings and recommendations are distributed in segmented newsletters, helping others and building trust.

B. As an Entrepreneur or Professional:

Global Showcase: Use the platform to position your business and increase your visibility in markets that previously seemed unreachable.

Effective Networking: Register and connect with a global network of other entrepreneurs and potential clients to expand your business.

Growth Tools: Access statistics, campaign analysis, and strategic support to scale your project.

communication.title:
4. Direct Communication:
Your Personal Chat and Your Digital Neighborhood
communication.description:
The platform is consciously designed to facilitate direct interpersonal communication and restore the familiar, personal atmosphere of a real 'neighborhood' in a modern, digital environment.

Immediate Interaction (Human to Human): At Dicilo, you don't speak with anonymous bots. We enable direct and transparent communication between buyer and seller. This way, you can agree on details individually, clarify questions in real-time, and break down barriers – for business as trustworthy as a handshake.

Vernacular Community ("Your Barrio"): We foster more than just trade; we build a closely knitted community. In this digital ecosystem, users not only discover products but benefit from active exchange. Through honest interactions with brands and neighbors, a network emerges based on mutual help and genuine recommendations.

Seamless Multi-channel Support: We are where you are. Our presence extends across all major channels – from WhatsApp and Telegram to social media. We ensure the conversation never stops and you find support and answers exactly where it is most convenient for you.

weAreDicilo.title: We Are Dicilo
weAreDicilo.description: At Dicilo, we create an ecosystem where businesses and consumers benefit from mutual growth and trust. We are not just a recommendation portal; we are a digital marketing platform based on authentic recommendations to drive success.

ourMission.title: Our Mission
ourMission.description: Our mission is to build a transparent and reliable network that allows consumers to find the best products and services, while giving businesses the opportunity to present themselves to an audience that values quality and excellence.

ourVision.title: Our Vision
ourVision.description: We aim to become the leading global platform for authentic recommendations, creating a community where trust between businesses and consumers is the foundation of all interactions. We strive to create an ecosystem where quality is always rewarded.

ourValues.title: Our Values
ourValues.description: Trust, transparency, quality, community, and innovation are the pillars on which Dicilo is built. We believe in the power of authentic recommendations to create meaningful connections and promote growth for all.

ourServices.title: Our Services
ourServices.description: We offer a wide range of digital marketing tools, personalized landing pages, and exclusive benefits for our members. Our platform is designed to increase the visibility of businesses and provide consumers with an exceptional experience.

businessModel.title: Our Business Model
businessModel.description: Our model is based on a symbiotic relationship: businesses gain visibility and access to a qualified audience, while users enjoy exclusive benefits and the certainty of finding the best options on the market. We believe in fair and sustainable growth for all.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We are constantly innovating to integrate the latest technologies into our platform, from artificial intelligence to advanced data analytics. Our goal is to offer an ever-evolving experience that meets the needs of our users and clients.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: We are committed to sustainable development and ethical business practices. We promote companies that share our values of social and environmental responsibility. We believe in growth that is not only economic but also positive for society and the planet.

community.title: Community
community.description: Dicilo is more than a platform; it is a community. We encourage active participation, the exchange of ideas, and collaboration between our members and businesses. Together, we are building a stronger and more reliable network.

data.title: Data and Analytics
data.description: We use data analytics to understand user behavior and preferences, offering personalized and relevant recommendations. Businesses receive valuable insights to optimize their strategies and better understand their target audience.
